explains: n. 速记（法）；简略的表达方式

sentences.en: I've got a job as a shorthand typist.
sentences.cn: 我找到了一份速记打字员的工作。

sentences.en: I gained a shorthand and typing diploma at evening classes.
sentences.cn: 我在夜校获得了速记和打字证书。

sentences.en: He taught himself shorthand to get an even better job later as a court stenographer and as a reporter in Parliament.
sentences.cn: 为了之后获得了一份更好的工作，成为一名法庭速记员和国会记者，他自学了速记。
